description: An egg used to install the Minecraft mod loader Forge into a server container.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Fabric Installer Egg Script

# Install sudo, curl, and java OpenJDK
apt-get update -y
apt-get upgrade -y
mkdir -p /usr/share/man/man1 /usr/share/man/man2
apt -y install sudo curl openjdk-11-jdk-headless
sudo dpkg --configure -a
update-alternatives --config java

# Download Fabric Installer
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
curl -o forge_installer.jar -L "https://maven.minecraftforge.net/net/minecraftforge/forge/${MINECRAFT_VERSION}-${FORGE_VERSION}/forge-${MINECRAFT_VERSION}-${FORGE_VERSION}-installer.jar"

# Cleanup old installed files
rm -rf /mnt/server/libraries
rm -rf /mnt/server/mods
rm -rf /mnt/server/configs
rm -rf /mnt/server/defaultconfigs
rm -rf /mnt/server/kubejs
rm -rf /mnt/server/scripts

# Run installer
java -jar forge_installer.jar --installServer

# Download Forge Wrapper if Minecraft version is 1.17 or higher.
[[ "${MINECRAFT_VERSION}" =~ ^[0-9]+\.(1[7-9]|[2-9][0-9]+)(\.[0-9]+)?$ ]] && curl -o server.jar "https://download.kinetichosting.net/minecraft/forge-launch-jar/server.jar"

# Cleanup
rm -f forge_installer.jar
rm -f run.sh
rm -f run.bat
rm -f forge_installer.jar.log
